rules_text:
When Flower Storm, the Idealistic enters, distribute three +1/+1 counters among any number of target creatures you control.
Team [i](Cast either side or both. When you cast both, the back is a token.)[/i]
rules_text2: Whenever you put one or more counters on Shadow Storm, the Cynical, each opponent loses that much life. You gain that much life. This ability triggers only once each turn.
